backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing visa application management with functions to submit, retrieve, update status, and seed sample applications stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: visa status form with validation, status results display, and professional government-style UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the visa status checker UI components, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with government-style navy, gold, and status colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the NZ Immigration E-Visa Checker application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing application state, toggling between visa status form and results views, and handling status check requests.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying important information, contact details, privacy notice, and attribution with caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component rendering NZ government emblem and Immigration New Zealand branding with navy blue background.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with header, hero section with background image, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/VisaStatusForm.t: Form component with validation for reference number, passport number, and date of birth fields, handling submission to check visa status.
frontend/src/components/VisaStatusResult: Results component displaying visa application details with color-coded status indicators, formatted dates, and next steps information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider component for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom hook for visa status checking that calls the backend actor's getVisaApplication method with a reference number and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom government-style color palette using OKLCH color space, including navy blue primary colors, status colors for visa applications, and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH colors for government styling, NZ-specific colors, status colors, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the NZ Immigration E-Visa Checker application state, including completed features for status checking form and UI, and pending backend implementation for storing/retrieving visa applications.
